question: please let us know your desired internship start date. our entry date is on the 1st and 16th of each month. please note that it will take approximately two month for the selection process to complete and 2 months to obtain a visa after the selection process is completed. / インターンシップの希望開始時期をご記入ください。入社日は毎月1日か16日です。選考にお時間を要しますので、ご応募から2ヶ月以上先の希望開始時期をご記入ください
answer:
You are open to remote work and willing to relocate.

Question: Please let us know your desired internship start date. Our entry date is on the 1st and 16th of each month. Please note that it will take approximately two months for the selection process to complete and 2 months to obtain a visa after the selection process is completed.

question: please let us know your desired internship end date. we ask the candidates to work as internship for three months. (negotiable) / インターンシップの希望終了時期をご記入ください。3ヶ月間インターンシップに参加して頂くことをお願いしております。(応相談)
answer:
Question: Would you like to participate in an internship for three months?
Yes

question: how many days/hours per week are you available to work? (which weekday, how many times, timeslot) / インターンシップに出勤可能な曜日、回数、時間帯をご記入ください。（週あたり）
answer:
I am open to a flexible schedule, but I don't have specific days/hours per week in mind. However, I can indicate that I am available on weekdays (e.g., Monday to Friday).

For an internship, I would be available to work on:

- Weekdays: Every weekday
- Frequency: Multiple times a week
- Timeslot: Flexible, but preferably morning or afternoon sessions

Please let me know if this meets your requirements.

answer: I have no experience with Mercari Group, but I learn fast.

question: what kind of your tech stack/skills do you think match the position?(maximum 150 words) / ご自身のどのようなテックスタックやスキルが弊社のエンジニアポジションにマッチしていると考えますか？＊最大300字
answer: I have experience with MERN Stack, Next.js, Elasticsearch. These technologies are relevant to the position I'm applying for.

question: all internships at the mercari group are conducted 【in japan】 for all positions. have you confirmed that your university allows you to join our internship in japan? you can participate in an online internship from anywhere in japan, but online internships from overseas are generally not allowed. please note: if you have not checked yet with your university and in case you can’t come to japan, there is a possibility that your offer will be withdrawn. / メルカリグループでのインターンシップは、全ポジション共通で【日本で実施されます】。来日でのインターンシップが大学側で認められているか、確認はお済みでしょうか？日本国内であればどこからでもオンラインでインターンにご参加いただけますが、海外からのオンラインインターンシップは原則不可です ※注意※日本でのインターンシップが認められない場合、オファーが取り消される可能性がございますので予めご了承ください。all internships at the mercari group are conducted 【in japan】 for all positions. have you confirmed that your university allows you to join our internship in japan? you can participate in an online internship from anywhere in japan, but online internships from overseas are generally not allowed. please note: if you have not checked yet with your university and in case you can’t come to japan, there is a possibility that your offer will be withdrawn. / メルカリグループでのインターンシップは、全ポジション共通で【日本で実施されます】。来日でのインターンシップが大学側で認められているか、確認はお済みでしょうか？日本国内であればどこからでもオンラインでインターンにご参加いただけますが、海外からのオンラインインターンシップは原則不可です ※注意※日本でのインターンシップが認められない場合、オファーが取り消される可能性がございますので予めご了承ください。requiredyesno

[for non-japanese candidates who live outside of japan] please be mindful that you will need to pay the income tax for the duration of the internship. if you are a non-resident in japan, income tax will be deducted from your monthly paycheck at a flat rate of 20.42%, which is set by the japanese tax law. definition of “non-resident” can be found in the url below. please select yes to move forward. [日本以外の国籍で現在日本国外にお住まいの方へ]インターン参加時、日本の非居住者の方は所得税20.42%が毎月の給与から控除されます。日本にお住まいの方は居住者扱いになり、所得税は累進課税となります。日本人の方でも海外在住の方は非居住者扱いになることがありますので、定義を以下リンクよりご確認ください。同意いただける場合は同意(yes)をお願いします。 https://www.nta.go.jp/taxes/shiraberu/taxanswer/gensen/2875.htm[for non-japanese candidates who live outside of japan] please be mindful that you will need to pay the income tax for the duration of the internship. if you are a non-resident in japan, income tax will be deducted from your monthly paycheck at a flat rate of 20.42%, which is set by the japanese tax law. definition of “non-resident” can be found in the url below. please select yes to move forward.
